message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
I'm not greedy, but I think I deserve more. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer to my price, but I still want more. Meet me here or I'll walk!
I'm getting desperate, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. I'm not going to take this insult!
